text: HardwareX is a peer-reviewed open access scientific journal dedicated to the open source design and construction of scientific instrumentation. The journal publishes science hardware shared under an open source hardware license. Published articles include science hardware over a broad range of scientific disciplines, from life science and engineering research, to ecological and environmental monitoring, to digital manufacturing (e.g. 3D printing), to educational tools. It popularizes the ideas of open-source hardware and open science. == References == == External links == * * HardwareX Frequently Asked Questions Category:Publications established in 2017 Category:Elsevier academic journals Category:English-language journals Category:Open-source hardware
title: HardwareX
